message_1: What is the bond dissociation energy (in kJ/mol) of the O-H bond in a water molecule if the energy required to break this bond is 464 kJ/mol?
message_2: The bond dissociation energy of the O-H bond in a water molecule is 464 kJ/mol. This is because the energy required to break the bond is given as 464 kJ/mol, which is the same as the bond dissociation energy.
